channel.title: R Markdown on Electronic Cigarette and Youth

item.title: Electronic Cigarette and Youth
item.description: I. Introduction E-cigarette Basics E-cigarettes are devices that heat a liquid into an aerosol that the user inhales. The liquid usually has nicotine and flavoring in it, and other additives. E-cigarettes are considered tobacco products because most of them contain nicotine, which comes from tobacco. Also known as e-cigarettes, e-cigs, electronic nicotine delivery systems, vaporizer cigarettes, and vape pens, they are marketed as a way to stop or cut down on smoking.
